plot: Using a unique 90 day engagement visa, four women travel to the US to live with their American fiances for the first time. Each couple has 90 days to wed before the visas expire and the women must return home.
plot_en: Using a unique 90 day engagement visa, four women travel to the US to live with their American fiances for the first time. Each couple has 90 days to wed before the visas expire and the women must return home.
plot_es: Using a unique 90 day engagement visa, four women travel to the US to live with their American fiances for the first time. Each couple has 90 days to wed before the visas expire and the women must return home.
title: 90 Day Fiance
